oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Abbey Waterworth - 2018-05-20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Musicians spotlight featuring Abbey Waterworth from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 20, 2018. Accompanied by Nick Sibley. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Abbey Waterworth; Nick Sibley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and introductions begin in progress / (01:24) Performs Black Is The Color Of My True Love's Hair / (02:30) Opening comments from Abbey / (03:05) Introduces the next song / (04:10) Performs Ain't Gonna Marry / (06:41) Introduces the next song / (07:03) Performs Summertime Sadness / (10:41) Talk about their backgrounds and the Springfield Missouri documentary Center of Nowhere / (12:30) Introduces the next song / (13:05) Performs My Man / (15:12) Performs Farewell Daddy Blues / (18:40) Talks about her musical tastes, her background and her album honoring Springfield's music titled Rosebridge / (21:50) Performs Cheesy Bread / (25:26) Introduces the next song / (26:13) Performs Reaching For Someone / (28:54) Introduces the next song / (30:23) Performs Martha / (33:32) Talks about NickSibley's jingle for O'Reilly Auto Parts and sings a portion of it / (34:04) Introduces the next song / (35:00) Performs A Beautiful Morning Like This / (37:42) Introduces the next song / (38:28) Performs Come To Me Now / (41:45) Performs Love Is Like Cornbread (Nick) / (44:13) Talk about Nick's CD / (45:29) Introduces the next song / (46:03) Performs Sugar Shack / (48:28) Answers question from the audience about her college course work and major / (50:23) Answers questions about her CD for sale / (50:50) Performs Savannah / (54:07) Final comments / (54:18) Walk-out Music / (01:10:37) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:format: original source recorded as an mp3 file at 44.1
